title: Cozy Living Room Hobbies and Leisure Time
description: Friends enjoy a variety of relaxing hobbies together in a cozy living room, from painting and reading to playing guitar and solving puzzles. Warm lighting and natural decor create a peaceful leisure atmosphere.
